data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Warband: The Chosen Axes
data.detailed_description:
LEARN TO PLAY


About the Game

Honor, gold, and a desire to banish the curse that haunts the city of Shadespire - these are what drive the mercenary Fyreslayers. Unlock this warband and play as The Chosen Axes in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

THE WARBAND


  • The Chosen Axes are a warband of 4 fighters.
  • The Chosen Axes inspire when they hold an objective at the end of an action phase! Be clever!
  • Their leader, Fjul-Grimnir, is an extremely heavy hitter able to dish out a large amount of damage!

TIPS & TRICKS


  • Place your objective markers where you're able to reach them early - holding them is how your fighters inspire!
  • Gain glory fast by building objective-holding cards into your deck!
  • The Fyreslayers are durable but slow. Add ploys and upgrades that focus on movement and swapping to get them to the objectives faster!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
